requirements.summary: Create elegant landing page showcasing luxury shop brand and shoe collection
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays shop name 'luxury shop' prominently
Design emphasizes visual showcase over functionality

file_operations.description: Transform App component into a landing page with hero section displaying 'Luxury Shop' branding, shoe gallery section, and contact information footer. Ensure clean, uncluttered layout with focus on visual showcase.

Create Hero component with prominent 'Luxury Shop' heading, luxury shop logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/luxury-shop-logo.dim_400x400.png, and elegant tagline. Design for visual impact with spacious layout.
Create ShoeGallery component to display shoe images in responsive grid layout. Wire this component into App.tsx as the main content section below the hero.

requirements.summary: Display shoe image gallery in attractive grid layout
acceptanceCriteria: Multiple shoe images are displayed in a visually appealing format
Images are high-quality and showcase shoes as the focal point
Gallery layout is responsive and works on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Implement responsive grid layout displaying the five generated shoe images: frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-heels.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-dress.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-sneakers.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-boots.dim_800x800.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-loafers.dim_800x800.png. Ensure images are focal points with appropriate spacing and mobile responsiveness.

requirements.summary: Display phone number 9079846195 prominently as contact method
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number 9079846195 is clearly visible on the page
On mobile devices, clicking the number initiates a phone call

file_operations.description: Create ContactInfo component displaying formatted phone number 9079846195 with tel: link for mobile click-to-call functionality. Wire this component into App.tsx footer or contact section.

requirements.summary: Add WhatsApp contact link for number 9079846195
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp icon or button is visible on the page
Clicking the WhatsApp contact opens WhatsApp with number 9079846195
Link works on both mobile and desktop devices

file_operations.description: Add WhatsApp button/icon with link using wa.me/9079846195 format to open WhatsApp on both mobile and desktop. Include recognizable WhatsApp icon or styling.

requirements.summary: Display generated luxury shop logo in hero section
acceptanceCriteria: Logo is rendered from the generated image asset
Logo appears in a prominent position (header or hero)
Logo is appropriately sized and maintains quality

file_operations.description: Integrate generated logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/luxury-shop-logo.dim_400x400.png into Hero component. Position prominently in header area with appropriate sizing to maintain quality and visual hierarchy.

acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme conveys sophistication and luxury
Layout provides ample whitespace around images
Overall aesthetic matches high-end fashion brands

file_operations.description: Define luxury-focused color palette emphasizing sophistication (golds, blacks, whites, subtle neutrals), elegant typography selections with appropriate font families, and establish spacing utilities for ample whitespace throughout the design.
Extend Tailwind configuration with custom luxury theme colors, refined typography scale, and spacing values that support high-end fashion aesthetic with generous whitespace.
